website_summaries.verdict: Satisfied customers don't mind spending a bit more money for a high-quality robe — as long as they want one that's quite heavy and thick.
pros: Garners praise for its heavy and thick material, which is made from 100% cotton material
cons: Sizing seems to be a bit off for taller men and smaller women

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: We bought a hot tub, so we needed something to wear to and from during our cold Maine winters. My husband LOVES this robe. He's had it 3 months now. It's very heavy, absorbent, and long. He bought me a robe for Christmas, and it's okay, but we both wish he had bought one of these. As for some people's comments that it falls apart....I bleach this every time I wash it and line dry it. So far it has held up fine. My husband is 5ft 10 and around 200 lbs. He got the XL. He might have been fine with a large, but I'd rather it be a little big than too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Roxief

customer_reviews.title: Thick and luxurious but watch out for the initial shedding
customer_reviews.text: The navy color is a saturated, almost royal blue color which I prefer, not quite that blue black you see online. You can tell it's made of a quality thick cotton, HOWEVER, when you first use it and get it wet my husband (who I bought it for) experienced tons of blue shedding all over his body. So much shedding that he didn't want to use it again. We found a solution online of washing it in hot water with a 1/2 a cup of baking soda in the laundry and it 'sealed' the fibers so that it no longer sheds. Aside from that it's a great luxurious robe.
customer_reviews.author: Viola

customer_reviews.title: order a medium size as recommended. However the medium size robe that I order ...
customer_reviews.text: very misleading picture and the product description. I am 5'10", 185lb, order a medium size as recommended. However the medium size robe that I order according to the page recommendation does not go down to my ankle (which is the main reason why I ordered this robe). There is still a foot of spacing before the robe actually reach my ankle!!! Unfortunately I ordered it in May of 2018, and was just trying it on at the end of August. Now it is to late to return it. Lessoned learned: do not always trust the product description, and try it on when you purchase it. Disappointed in this product and the false advertisement posted on the product description page.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: This Robe's a Winner
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful robe with a great weight. Wish they would offer "Extra Long" for us tall folks, but have been wanting a lux all terry robe and this one certainly fits the bill. Did a heavy duty washing to insure that all the chems were out, and didn't fade a bit. Definitely worth the price and makes a great gift for someone that likes a nice full comfortable robe. Update: I won't downgrade the review as it's still a quality garment, however it pulls on almost anything. I would not recommend this to someone with a cat or a lot of sharp edges in their home.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: falling apart after one year and 3-4 washes
customer_reviews.text: robe was great when received, now, one year later, after 3-4 washes, is badly fraying with 100s of loose threads.
customer_reviews.author: quietdesperation

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this now for just over 2 years and use it almost daily when i get out of the shower. It's so much nicer, warmer and more convenient than using a towel. While i'm sure some of the color has faded, that's to be expected. There are no holes, rips, bare spots, strings coming off. it's in really great condition after 2 years of almost daily use. I wash it at least once a week. I'm 6'2 and find that the length is great, it goes well past the knees. The width or girth (whatever you want to call it) it also plenty, when tied i have no fears of being exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Will.who

customer_reviews.title: Careful about the sizes
customer_reviews.text: This robe is THICK! It is HEAVY! In short, it is a solidly made robe. We originally bought the children's large version of this robe for our son. The listing said that the waist for the children's was 42 inches, but he could NOT close it around his 30 inch waist. We gambled on this one (we were concerned it would be too long) and thankfully it worked. The listing for this claims a 42 inch waist, but I could not close it around my 38 inch wait. These are great quality robes, but I think they need to correct their listings on measurements.
customer_reviews.author: W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Sizing pretty close
customer_reviews.text: 5'8" 199 lbs sizing chart was close. It suggested a medium. Sleeves about perfect. comes to my wrists. Robe length I expected to be ankle length based on chart and review comments as well but it's mid calf. That's ok and long enough. Any shorter and I'd have been unhappy but I feel getting a medium/long would have then made the arm length too long. Just a bit of a surprise with all pieces of the equation considered I expected ankle length. We are all built a bit different so it will never be 100% accurate 100% of the time. Great quality and heavy weight. Very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my wife, she's very pleased... Purchase with confidence
customer_reviews.text: Purchased an XL for my wife's X-mas gift. At 5' 9" she wanted a robe with large pockets, "Ankle" length and heavy in weight. This fits all three (3) requests. On a side note the quality is excellent, no stitching has failed, washed twice. Color/dye retention excellent, no fading or pigment loss. She's very pleased.... (Channel and Louboutin don't make robes, nuff said) ...Cheers.....
customer_reviews.author: Abe Froman

customer_reviews.title: Runs a touch small
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these for my husband years ago and he wore the heck out of it. The quality is excellent. Nice, heavy weight. Well-sewn. For a guy that's 6' 3" it is long enough but doesn't wrap around quite as much. Sleeves and shoulder are a bit smaller, too, so it will be returned. I laid old and new out to compare and the new one is indeed a bit smaller. This could be a good thing for tall but thinner people! For all we know, the current one may have sort of stretched over time -- that's how long he's had the old one. The seller's service is outstanding and that counts for quite a lot!
customer_reviews.author: S Greene

customer_reviews.title: The best I've found
customer_reviews.text: This is a full length robe and fits as pictured. I have the XL and it goes down to my ankles, I'm 6'. The sleeves are also full length and reach my wrists, unlike several other robes I've tried. Others have complained about shrinkage. I measured this before and after washing, and it's exactly the same size. I washed cold and air dried. The robe material is soft and comfortable. It's a bit heavy due to the amount of material on this robe, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Stark

customer_reviews.title: Good for lounging
customer_reviews.text: HEAVY! Not as absorbant as I was hoping, super thick and plush, definitely gives you fuzzies/lint all over your body if you wear it while wet...good for lounging around the house though. I don't recommend keeping it hung by the little hoop by the tag because it will break quick. If you hang it on a plastic clothes hanger it will bend the hanger...
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: This is a WINTER robe...
customer_reviews.text: This is a monster of a robe! By far the thickest, bulkiest Turkish bath robe I have ever owned. Well made and fits well (with the exception of the tie, which seems a bit short), I will probably need to purchase another, lighter robe for use the rest of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P.

customer_reviews.title: XL fits like a Medium
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL because of my height and weight (6'3", 280lbs) and while it is longer than my previous robe, the amount of overlap at the front of the robe is not sufficient to maintain propriety while seated. The robe seems like it was cut for a stick figure, not an actual human person. The robe has about 4 inches of overlap at the front. My previous robe, a High Sierra XL, gives a solid 10 inches of overlap at the front, more than enough to sit down without revealing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely heavy, can wear outside when it is 0 degrees. When new it touches the floor, sizing compared to chart is fairly accurate. Definitely follow care instructions, do NOT wash in warm water. I made that mistake and it did shrink considerably, about 3" in length. Other than me not paying attention to washing instructions once, I absolutely love this robe. Says a lot as I don't really care about clothing much, I'm a jeans and tee shirt guy. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Greenstreet

customer_reviews.title: After reading all the reviews before purchasing I thought I had bought the best sizes for my brother and wife for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable! After reading all the reviews before purchasing I thought I had bought the best sizes for my brother and wife for Christmas. The picture shows the robe as hitting right at the ankle and they hit them right above the knee! And my sister in laws belt loops hit right at her breast! So disappointed and would NEVER order from this company again! The only thing that was accurate was that the robes were heavy! What a joke!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Clemons

customer_reviews.title: This Is The One
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced a terry cloth robe that was close to what I had years ago, same price as this, lasted six years ... But this is it...much better! If you want a thick, heavy weight robe that you can get out of the shower in winter, put on and be dry and warm, this is it. The belt, cuffs, lapel...everything seems quality stitched. I'm 5'10, 195lbs, 46 chest and this thing engulfs me. Slightly long in the cuff and to my ankles. I need to check but I think it was sized L /XL. Great robe.. Get it before tariffs kick in !
customer_reviews.author: Rattlebone

customer_reviews.title: My favorite robe!! Looks good and feels like it's good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite bath robe. I feel that the quality is somewhat high and would buy this again or give it as a gift for someone else. What I like about it is that it's thick and feels heavy. I had to research Turkish Cotton vs Egyptian cotton before purchasing this. Apparently Turkish cotton is better at drying/evaporating the moisture that it absorbs compared to Egyptian cotton while Egyptian cotton supposedly absorbs a little more water to help dry you. I'm not wearing this robe all the time right after the shower, I'm just wearing it around the house when I'm feeling lazy, so I feel more comfortable with the Turkish cotton (which it's made from).
customer_reviews.author: CAHS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Yes. Great. Just what was wanted for getting out of a shower when it in the single digits outside. Am 6' 2" and 250 lbs. More a basketball players build then a football player. With a belly! Fits great, length is about 2" above ankles which is perfect. Sleeves are actually long enough "mid palm". Robe has some weight to it.....as others have stated it's like a towel that wants to be a bear skin. For a winter after shower garment it's the best I have ever owned. FYI: not exactly something I'm gonna lounge around in, I'd prefer a microfiber or velour robe for that.
customer_reviews.author: Xeb

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality -- just a little long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is 6' tall and 175 lbs. He likes a roomy fit, so I ordered a large. It was wonderful in quality and the cotton was as expected for really good Turkish terry cloth. I did have to cut off the bottom portion of the robe about 8" as it comes very long.... but it was easy to sew seam binding along the bottom to create a non-fray hem. It now reaches just about mid-calf and is perfect. I made wash cloths from the cut away portion so nothing was wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: It fits just right, as opposed to being roomy. I'm a 34 and usually wear a medium shirt. It's really nice, though. Also a little shorter than what I am used to, but these are only preferences. The robe itself is fantastic, and I'll probably grow to really like the snugness of it.
customer_reviews.author: gmoney

customer_reviews.title: BEST GIFT EVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift. Since his chemo he is always cold but this did the trick. It is very heavy weight terrycloth and the fit was perfect. It launders well but it does shrink in length. Still, my husband constantly tells me this is his favorite all time gift.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeboxsMom

customer_reviews.title: husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: He kept complaining that he needed a robe. I ordered plush ones last year, but he said he really missed his lovely Turkish terry cloth robe that he had worn for many years until it died in a house fire. When I found this one, I was delighted and he loves it too...wears it all the time. The fit is good except on a 5"9" man, it is a tiny bit long. I will have to take up the hem for him. But It is wonderfully thick and warm and will probably last him the rest of his life.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie mccurdy

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected!
customer_reviews.text: This bathrobe is a light-heavy, and very absorbent. You could get out of the shower/tub and simply put these on if you wanted, forgoing a towel. Is very warm. Have a hot tub out in your snowy backyard? That'll be all you need for the in-between. Really, these are marvelous. I highly recommend them, and I will likely buy more as luxury (nice to have but not necessary, so you never end up getting them for yourself) gifts for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Locatelli

customer_reviews.title: Thick, toasty warm, and nice long length
customer_reviews.text: This robe is exactly as described online. The terrycloth is thick and rich and warm. The size XL fits my 6'2" husband perfectly, even after washing. We chose this robe for the longer length, as most robes only reach to his calves, and he was happy that this one comes all the way down to his ankles. I should mention that we detected an odd odor when it was removed from the plastic container it was shipped in, but this disappeared after the first washing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lee Carlyon

customer_reviews.title: Love these robes!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible robes! heavy, thick and luscious. My husband is a 6'2" man and his (XL) comes to his upper ankle. I'm a 5' woman and mine (S) comes to my lower ankle. We got them to put on when getting out of the hot tub. They absorb water like crazy. Caution - wash them before using or they will shed. Also, don't use liquid softener as it will cause them to be less absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader Santa Fe

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I ever bought for helping me with showering on my own.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lung disease which makes showering and drying off very exhausting. With this robe I can get out of the shower put it on, and it dries my body without me having to wear myself out. It's a little heavy, but I wanted something that would absorb water and it does that.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Cross

customer_reviews.title: Resort spa quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace a long heavy terry robe my wife made years ago. I had despaired of finding a replacement until I desided to try this one. I was quite surprised as in the past long robes had only reached mid calf at best and were beach blanket weight. This robe is ankle length, twice the usual weight and very well made. Great for cold mornings or chilly evenings. Given the quality and initial impression of wearability this is a terrific buy,
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bathrobe!
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a perfect bathrobe. One that didn't get nasty if you put it on immediately after a shower, was long enough, and was still comfortable to just wear around the house. This thing has been amazing. I can put it on after a shower and it absorbs the moisture but doesn't then stick to the body. The robe reaches down to my ankles and I am a tall man, so I feel covered. As for comfort, this robe is perfect for warming up and I find myself finding excuses to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G.

customer_reviews.title: It replaces an older LL Bean robe that I loved. Reinforced stitching on this robe is even better ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 6' 170 lbs 36" arms. I ordered size XL. The arm length could be another 1/2 inch longer but comes to my wrist OK. The length comes to about 2" above my feet. I looked hard for something substantial to be critical about but could not. This is a well made robe. It replaces an older LL Bean robe that I loved. Reinforced stitching on this robe is even better and at less cost and a little heavier. I love this robe! Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this robe
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe! It is plush, heavy, soft and appears well made. It will probably last 20 years, just like my last similar robe did. The size purchased was OSFM (one size fits most). I washed the robe twice, with an extra rise, then dried in a medium heat dryer. The sleeves and body shrunk about 1.5 inches, but it still fits well. If you have a big belly, however, you should go for a larger size. I'm about size 40" in the waist, but this would fit best for people with size 38" waist or smaller. I'm losing my gut at the gym, so I'm keeping this great robe.
customer_reviews.author: Octopus8

customer_reviews.title: Great bathrobe but came with a little stain
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and absorbent. You can’t beat Turkish cotton when it comes to textiles and towels. There was a little stain that looked it nail polish on arrival. Went away with the first wash
customer_reviews.author: Solanacea

customer_reviews.title: Extremely heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I pick this robe up, I'm amazed at how heavy it is. I'd like to find a way to "weigh" it but it's too bulky to use my bathroom scale. I'll bet it weighs, at a minimum, 10 lbs.! Other than that, it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great bathrobe
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bathrobe I've ever owned. The first one large enough to go to my ankles, I'm 6'3". It is very heavy and bulky, like wrapping up in a terrycloth blanket. The weave is a little more coarse than I expected but after a couple of washings it will probably not be as noticeable. Still super comfortable and very well made
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable robe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bathrobe heavy sturdy good quality super soft and comfy sizing is a little awkward. Normally my father wears a large extra large and he was swimming in this bathrobe in the arms and in the length but the width around him was nearly perfect so we went down to the medium hoping that that will be a better fit but I have a feeling it will be too short
customer_reviews.author: Ali-Kat

customer_reviews.title: its great
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5'10 guy who shrunk to 5'8 1/2 and it lands right at my ankles. so if you are 5'5 mmmmm it might be like linus on peanuts. If you don't get it then you are way young. But anyhow this robe is soft as soft can get. It would be like going to a spa and getting this robe, That's how good it is. Buy this bad boy, it will not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: KENNY

customer_reviews.title: Forgot I had hips
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe. It fits the upper part of my body loosely, but the bottom half is a little tight although it fits. The material that it is made of is thick and warm. I suggest that women do the measuring at the hip level to insure a more comfortable fit. I would have thought of returning, but it is not offered in the size I might need. I will probably get another one at a later date. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: L.B.T.W

customer_reviews.title: Size matters.
customer_reviews.text: What I liked is the weight and warmth. What I don't like is the size. It is about 3 to 4 inches short in the arms and in length. This is a really bad fit and not sized for 42. I don't usually return my mistakes I just find someone who can use it when it is not too expensive and they can enjoy it. Will find something else.
customer_reviews.author: larry sibbitt

customer_reviews.title: really bad experience, imagine coming out of the shower putting ...
customer_reviews.text: this rope won't stop shedding red fibers even after it has been in the laundry 5 times, really bad experience, imagine coming out of the shower putting on a rope and anding covered in red fibers
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: and is great for drying him off after a shower
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it! It is warm, soft, and is great for drying him off after a shower. It is heavy since it is towel-like material, but it is fine because my boyfriend is usually cold. When you wash it the first couple times, wash it by itself because of the fuzzies and dye.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: Best TURKISH ROBE ever
customer_reviews.text: The robe I ordered said One Size fits most but I received a Medium. So it's a bit snug on my husband. But that's okay because now I use it!!! It is unbelievably comfortable. Soft, plush, and warm. I had a Turkish robe for many years and I thought nothing could compare to it but this robe is even better. The level of water absorbency is incredible! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: veronica bode

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy, discolors easily
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this bad boy out here in Afghanistan for months now, and I still get plenty of jealous looks from other deployed folks. Warm, soft, and comfy. All the stuff you'd expect from a Turkish bathrobe. Two notable downsides: 1) even though I wear a VERY mild deodorant and don't even have it on on the way to the showers, even the two minute trips with the mild deodorant on the way back to my room have caused noticeable discoloration in the robe's armpits. Not so great. 2) The robe is so long that it is actually kind of difficult to walk in. Have to keep steps very small and short.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. S. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy weight robe
customer_reviews.text: I love this robe - it is heavy and well made. I ordered extra large (I am 5'10" and 215") as they did not have large at the time. Figured I would have a little of an issue as the sleeves are a bit long (touch my finger tips) but all-in-all good fit otherwise. Very warm. Have not washed it yet so may or may not shrink. Still great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Very Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit, heavy as discribed
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! This robe is exactly what I was looking for. It's a nice heavy robe that fit as expected. The length is perfect as well. I love this robe and plan to buy one as a Christmas present. I did expect the navy blue to be darker, but, the dark blue is dark enough.
customer_reviews.author: debnc

customer_reviews.title: EXCEEDED expectations
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the very best robe I ever bought in the last 40 yrs---and that is saying something because I have purchased from all the fancy catalogues, from name-brand stores in USA and 'bath' retailers nationwide. Buying towels and robes is rarely this easy (and in the past, I have almost always ended up disappointed and wondering if my expectations are simply too high) but this robe exceeded every expectation I had. After several washings (it's been almost a year since I lucked onto this authentic & high-end brand) in all temperatures, the dye has held true, the color is still intensely blue and the fabric has stood up to every detergent we've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks as if it's not color-fast
customer_reviews.text: The robe is too small (I ordered a Medium, espresso brown), and it came in a clear plastic zipper bag with white fabric seam coverings -- but the seam coverings are stained yellowish from, I assume, the dark brown dye of the robe -- or else the bag and the robe have been sitting around on a shelf for so long that the white turned yellow. Not encouraging. I'm returning it because the overlap is too narrow, will ask for the next size up, and a different color.
customer_reviews.author: "suzych"

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy (In a good way!) Fit is on the larger side
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and heavy robe! Would highly recommend even at this price point it's worth every penny. I'm a 6'2 200 pound male and the XL fits a little larger than expected, but I've learned to love it! The sleeves come down right to wrist and I have maybe 4-6 inches of robe off the floor. Only slight negative I could think of is that it's not as soft as I thought it would be. Hopefully after the next few washes it will soften up a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: henry

customer_reviews.title: Very slim fit.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I guess I'm not as skinny as I used to be, and this robe was way too slim-fitting. I used the chart to chose the size, but it was just too tight. When I sat down, the front would open wide, discomfort and loss of warmth ensued. I had to send it back...my son LOVED his, so like I said, if you are skinny-skinny, it will work for you. The terry is fantastically thick and soft. I was sorry to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: sommjet

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as you'd might imagine
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this to be a fur coat but i expected it to be slightly softer than it is. The material is very heavy and will keep you warm. i just wouldn't expect it to be terribly comfortable sitting in for more than an hour. The quality is fantastic and the water is fully absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Grant G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!  My favorite robe of all time!
customer_reviews.text: Right away when you open the package, you can tell the product is of the highest quality: the cotton is thick and luxurious, and even the belt is heavy from the abundance of Turkish cotton used. Don't forget to follow the manufacturer's directions and wash it before use. When I wear it now around my apartment, I feel like a millionaire!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice robe
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this robe. His old one had literally fallen to pieces. It was replaced with a lighter weight, poly/cotton blend that was not nearly as heavy and he never felt warm in it. This one is perfect. It is heavy enough for those chilly mornings and fits him perfectly - he is 5' 10" and the length is shorter than the picture, hitting about mid-calf, which is where he likes it. I was nervous about ordering it, but the return policy was perfect - not that we wound up needing it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: This robe exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This robe truly exceeded my expectations. I have really been a “robe wearer”; my Wife was after me to buy one. I selected this robe from the picture and description; GLAD I DID. The robe is plush, very comfortable and warm. The heaviest I have ever worn ( this is not a negative). Two large pockets. And guess what; the belt stays tightened. I highly recommend this robe.
customer_reviews.author: SKK

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and cozy as it should be. I purchased Large based on my height, which is a good fit but not too much extra on the covering of my not-so-small chest and stomach. But that is how most of the robs seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Sivan

customer_reviews.title: Great robe - wish it lasted longer..,
customer_reviews.text: This robe came quickly, fit perfectly, and was really nice overall in terms of quality. It was really soft and the heaviness was comforting - it didn't feel cheap. However, it's been three months and the fibers are starting to unravel in some spots. It's been machine washed cold with regular detergent so maybe it takes a different sort of method?? Will continue using it though until it's completely destroyed; that's both a good and bad thing!
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great Robe
customer_reviews.text: Obviously much too warm for wearing these days but it fits as expected nice and long and just really feels great can't wait for cooler weather to to wear this robe. Top Quality stitching and fabric. I've had large robes before and this ranks right up there if not better.
customer_reviews.author: KGW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome robe!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6'1" and 190lbs. This robe in a large fits me perfectly! Very heavy and warm! I keep my house at 62 degrees and I am still nice and cozy in this robe. I haven't had it long and have only washed it once, but it seems that the quality is there to be a long lasting robe.
customer_reviews.author: 8Suzy1966

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: In July I ordered a female size small ("SM" shown on order). I am 5'1. The item itself says "M" on the label. The item fits my 6'3" (193 cm) tall male partner. We ordered an XL through Turkish Towels for my partner who needed slightly longer arms. BOTH robes are EXACTLY the same size. Have not returned either product as postage is very expensive and it will cost me more with no guarantee we will get the right sizing. Not happy customers.
customer_reviews.author: Nodycart

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my father last Christmas and it has held up to daily use. It still looks as nice as the day I bought it and i would recommend this product to anyone looking for a high quality but affordable bathrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Grace

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this robe a while back for my husband and just bought one for myself. It's very absorbent and is a good weight. Highly recommend for an after shower terry robe.
customer_reviews.author: lilibee

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a very old one for my husband. He really loves it. Said fits perfect. Dries very well. Asking for another one to use for getting out of the hot tub instead of a towel. He seldom gets or asks for anything for himself. So, must be very nice if he's wanting another (extra) one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality! I was so leary of getting a thin fall apart terry robe when I was looking to buy this for my husband. IT is AWESOME! Heavy duty! Couldn't be happier! My husband has never had a robe and is really enjoying it for lounging and even a few times after his shower. ;) I got him the steel in L/XL. The color is Perfect! As is the size... which is something I was also worried about. He is 6' 2", around 240 and very broad in the shoulders and it fits him great!!!! Update: 2+ years later - the robe is still going strong. Washes up great Every time! Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.author: L. A. West

customer_reviews.title: Lint EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure about the other color robes, but I bought my boyfriend the red color robe and there is lint everywhere! We've washed it 3 times and our bathroom is covered with red lint on the counters, floor, and even in the bathroom ceiling fan. Its really a nightmare to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9 1/5, and ordered a XL. This is what I was looking for. The length is just above my ankles, but not on the floor. I have long arms, and the arm fit just right. It's very heavy, and will keep me warm in the winter with or without my PJ! Haven't wash it yet, beside it' too hot in Georgia to even wear it . LOL
customer_reviews.author: Prophet P.

customer_reviews.title: Huge oversized robe
customer_reviews.text: The robe is amazing quality Just be very careful with the size! I orderd xl thinking it was a normal xl but it was really for someone bewtween 6 -7 feet tall and that is no joke. It was so long it was like a wedding dress with a train! The size description should be posted in the beginning instead of burried deep in the description
customer_reviews.author: Cutrano AZ Troop Run, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality terry bath robes are hard to find but ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my husband perfectly. Good quality terry bath robes are hard to find but this one is exactly what I was looking for. My husband loves it! It does, however take a while to completely dry so I recommend when it gets damp to throw it in the dryer for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne M. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: Robe
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new robe. High quality, warm and attractive. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita C.

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD QUALITY OF MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: I have a 36 inch waist and this XL could have been could have been mad a little bit bigger. Any body much bigger than this and it probably wouldn't close good. I am 5'9" and this could also been an inch or two shorter. The quality is good however. No doubt about that.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck's Review

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Warm, comfortable, nice looking. Just what I was looking for. Great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hite

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice robe, but just a touch too short both ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the size that the size chart suggested. It is a very nice robe, but just a touch too short both in length and sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: ThePoetOAS

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: This bathrobe is heavy and keeps one warm on the coldest evenings. It is especially nice to have when getting out of the shower after drying off. I particularly happy with the weight of the material and hope it will give years of service.
customer_reviews.author: muleskinner

customer_reviews.title: My husband didn't love it, we ended up returning it
customer_reviews.text: My husband didn't love it, we ended up returning it. It is a good, heavy material but it is not very soft. He wanted something more like fleece instead of terry cloth/towel material. It also smelled VERY STRONGLY like vinegar which was strange - although the smell may have come out once we washed it, we didn't want to chance it and then not be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kozak

customer_reviews.title: so lush
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how thick the cotton is. The thing actually weighs six pounds (yes I weighed it). I totally love this robe. It was a little pricey, but well worth it. It is long too. I am six feet tall and it comes down well below my knees.
customer_reviews.author: WillyP

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift and my hubby loves it. It is a bit oversized but that is ok because he is over 6 ft so he liked that it is long.
customer_reviews.author: Neisy

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy robe
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and warmest robe I have ever received. I am 6'1" and it fits great. I recommend this robe to all my friends. Please note the above headline. This robe is HEAVY.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBoy88

customer_reviews.title: This is the Real Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: This robe will last far beyond my lifetime. Fit and finishing quality surpasses every “Turkish” Teri robe I’ve tried in the past. I mean, my xl men’s robe weighs in the neighborhood of 5 pounds and made out very high quality Turkish Teri Cloth, it’s the warmest robe I’ve ever found. Purchased the xl long robe and I love it. Made in Turkey
customer_reviews.author: Hippy Dave

customer_reviews.title: Best robe ever
customer_reviews.text: This robe is everything I hoped it would be. It is heavy and cozy and so much more than I expected for the price. It fits me perfectly (5'5", 130 lbs) but if you like your robes very roomy you might consider going up a size. I got an XS.
customer_reviews.author: Salt Lake Joan

customer_reviews.title: How Does it come through the Wash?
customer_reviews.text: I would live in this robe 24/7 if convention allowed, but it's kind of hard to explain walking the dog in it, especially in the rain. It is luxurious and comfortable, but very heavy. In fact, the reason for four stars instead of five is because I'm really concerned about laundering it. It will need a heavy duty washing machine and a long time in the dryer or the sun, whenever that may return. I hope it doesn't shrink because the just-below-ankle length is just what I wanted. I'd be happy to add to this once the robe has been laundered.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Thick and soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought two smalls for my wife and I. She's 5'3 and I'm 5'7. Her robe goes to just above her ankle and mine falls to about mid-calf. We wear them for the short walk to our pool and hot tub on cool Arizona nights.
customer_reviews.author: KK Iowa

customer_reviews.title: This robe will last many years
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was very quick and product is as described. I am 5' 6" but have a gut and broad shoulders so I got the large but probably should have got the medium. My only complaint is the length. It covers my ankles and is treacherous going up and down stairs so wear it open not tied closed if you are short like me. I do love how thick it is and is heavy but is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Short

customer_reviews.title: Great bathrobe and fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews unless something notable happens and such was the case in my dealings with TurkishTowels - thank you for your wonderful, hassle-free customer service. It is really excellent and very much appreciated. And the bathrobe is a great product too, so 5 stars all round. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and heavy. Keeps you warm, but not as soft as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be very well made, very absorbent and feels great after the shower or hot tub. The terry is very thick so the robe is fairly heavy which I don't mind. If the weight doesn't bother you I definitely recommend this robe.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Finnemore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BETTER THAN SPECTED, HEAVY, SOFT , IT ABSORB WATER VERY WELL, I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.author: jose corona sr

customer_reviews.title: Great robe
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for Xmas and I love it! I wear it constantly throughout the house because I’m always cold!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful robe
customer_reviews.text: This company makes amazing robes. They're very plush, very colorful, very comfortable. I would recommend using the size chart as they run a little bigger than a traditional American size may be, but the chart is very specific about all relative measurements. Overall, I couldn't be happier with this purchase. I'm not sure how the price compared to what I could've gotten in a store, but I will say the price that I paid is very fair (even a little low actually) based upon the quality of the product we received.
customer_reviews.author: DPAZ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic robe. I'm about 5-9
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic robe. I'm about 5-9, but I like a full-length robe that I can wrap two layers over my lap when sitting, so I ordered, I think, the large. It grazes the top of my feet when standing (after washing), and is very comfortable and warm. Also, the sleeves are not too long. My previous robe's sleeves were. This one goes to mid-finger length when hanging, but when sitting and resting my arms on a table while writing reviews of things I have bought on Amazon, the sleeves pull back to my wrists. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Huw Powell

customer_reviews.title: Very thick, not the greatest coverage
customer_reviews.text: It's a very well-made and thick robe, a little too thick for me. The length is okay, the biggest complaint is that it doesn't really cover overlap much in the front, and it's a bit tight overall. I'm really not that big of a person but it's not too easy to close the front and feel you're fully covered. I mean, robes are kind of like that but I think it's just too small around.
customer_reviews.author: Trees4est

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and snuggle-worthy.
customer_reviews.text: This robe does, as explained in the description, run large. However, that is exactly what mom wanted. She raves about how cozy this robe is. The color is lovely A great winter, terry robe; not a thin spa-type robe.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy and well-made. It fits my tall husband nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sent me the wrong robe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a robe without a hood, but the one I got has one. It is a VERY nice robe though! Only minor complaint is it would be nice if the strap was about 5 inches longer. Its not worth the hassle of returning it so I decided to keep it and live with hood I do not want or need.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes I am more comfortable sleeping on a couch
customer_reviews.text: I am a large, but ordered XL because I wanted a robe that is basically a wearable blanket. That's exactly what I got. Sometimes I am more comfortable sleeping on a couch, and instead of dragging out a blanket, I simply wrap myself in this robe and sleep very comfortably! Fit my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Smith

customer_reviews.title: This Is It!
customer_reviews.text: Huge and heavy, just what I wanted. I am 5'10" (1.78m) and it just touches the instep. Can't say it is perfect yet; I have to see how many years it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: DazedbyDeweyDecimal

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over the place for something like this. Best robe I ever. Warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Franz

customer_reviews.title: Worth $90
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy a heavy, warm robe this is the one. Length is excellent, down to ankles at 6'2" tall. Only short coming is the belt size which would be small for someone with a larger gut area.
customer_reviews.author: ROGATIONDAYS

customer_reviews.title: Finally the Perfect Robe!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband wanted! Thick, heavy, warm, soft and long! We have searched high and low and this was my fourth try to retire a very old robe that he loved...this one did it! Extremely happy and it was delivered faster than expected! Really pleased and highly recommend...extremely pleased with quality and value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best robe I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I am a large( OK I'm fat). The robe is great. I ordered 2X and it fits around me with plenty to spare. It absorbs water like a sponge. My only problem is that I am 5'7" and the bottom of the robe just brushes the floor. When I put it on I just pull up the robe a little bit before I tighten the belt. One other thing, even dry it is very heavy. I plan to buy another one to keep at my daughter's home because I visit her often.
customer_reviews.author: John Young

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy, too scratchy and too small (XL for 6'2" 250 wasn't wide enough, and the belt was too short as well.) Returned immediately. I would recommend the Arus Men's Shawl Collar Full Length Long Fleece Robe instead.
customer_reviews.author: T. Straugh

customer_reviews.title: Love this robe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried through the years many, many robes for my husband. He like cotton robes and he is tall...six foot four..and we had a hard time finding them long enough. I had read all of the reviews and the only thing that concerned me was comments about it may be too short or sleeves too short. His fit perfectly. It may be that he is lean and does not have a bigger middle like some that would make it shorter. He is absolutely thrilled with it. He is wearing it this very minute.
customer_reviews.author: vivian e webb

customer_reviews.title: Within the first week the "belt loop" on the left ...
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week the "belt loop" on the left side came loose. Which is kind of disappointing considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
